mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS userID, USER_NM as userNm, USER_GROUP_NO as userGroupNo , USED_YN as usedYn FROM EL_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USED_YN = 'Y' AND APP_ID = #{appId}

SELECT USER_ID AS userID, USER_NM as userNm, USER_GROUP_NO as userGroupNo, USED_YN as usedYn FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM EL_USER WHERE APP_ID = #{appId} ORDER BY USER_NM ASC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{recordCountPerPage} and RNUM > #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM EL_USER WHERE APP_ID = #{appId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EL_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND APP_ID = #{appId}
